issues.title: [SPS]: Provide storage policy satisfy worker at DN for co-ordinating the block storage movement work
[SPS]: Daemon thread in Namenode to find blocks placed in other storage than what the policy specifies
[SPS]: Protocol buffer changes for sending storage movement commands from NN to DN
[SPS]: Add satisfyStoragePolicy API in HdfsAdmin
[SPS]: Add block movement tracker to track the completion of block movement future tasks at DN
[SPS]: Mover tool should not be allowed to run when Storage Policy Satisfier is on
[SPS]: Provide mechanism to send blocks movement result back to NN from coordinator DN
[SPS]:Provide retry mechanism for the blocks which were failed while moving its storage at DNs
[SPS]: Handling of block movement failure at the coordinator datanode
[SPS]: Provide unique trackID to track the block movement sends to coordinator
[SPS] Make storage policy satisfier daemon work on/off dynamically
[SPS]: Provide persistence when satisfying storage policy.
[SPS]: StoragePolicySatisfier should gracefully handle when there is no target node with the required storage type
[SPS]: Daemon thread of SPS should start only in Active NN
[SPS]: Erasure coded files should be considered for satisfying storage policy
[SPS]: Check Mover file ID lease also to determine whether Mover is running
[SPS]: Add a protocol command from NN to DN for dropping the SPS work and queues
[SPS]: Handle partial block location movements
[SPS]: Double checks to ensure that SPS/Mover are not running together
[SPS]: Make SPS movement monitor timeouts configurable
[SPS]: Local DN should be given preference as source node, when target available in same node
[SPS]: chooseTargetTypeInSameNode should pass accurate block size to chooseStorage4Block while choosing target
[SPS]: NN switch and rescheduling movements can lead to have more than one coordinator for same file blocks
[SPS]: Remove xAttrs when movements done or SPS disabled
[SPS]: Fix timeout issue in unit tests caused by longger NN down time
[SPS]: SPS should clean Xattrs when no blocks required to satisfy for a file
[SPS]: Add CLI command for satisfy storage policy operations
[SPS]: Namenode failed to start while loading SPS xAttrs from the edits log.
[SPS] : StoragePolicySatisfier should not select same storage type as source and destination in same datanode.
[SPS] : Empty files should be ignored in StoragePolicySatisfier.
libhdfs++: Get minidfscluster tests running under valgrind
[SPS]: Document the SPS feature
[SPS] : Handle NPE in BlockStorageMovementTracker when dropSPSWork() called
[SPS]: Should give chance to satisfy the low redundant blocks before removing the xattr
[SPS] Correct the log in BlockStorageMovementAttemptedItems#blockStorageMovementResultCheck
libhdfs++: Fix compilation errors and warnings when compiling with Clang
[SPS]: Improve storage policy satisfier configurations
[SPS]: Fix checkstyle warnings

libhdfs++: PROTOC_IS_COMPATIBLE check fails if protobuf library is built from source
[SPS]: Provide a mechanism to recursively iterate and satisfy storage policy of all the files under the given dir
[SPS]: Provide an option to track the status of in progress requests
libhdfs++: Prevent Requests from holding dangling pointer to RpcEngine
[SPS] : Block movement analysis should be done in read lock.
[SPS]: Refactor Co-ordinator datanode logic to track the block storage movements
[SPS]: Rebasing HDFS-10285 branch after HDFS-10467, HDFS-12599 and HDFS-11968 commits
[SPS]: Modularize the SPS code and expose necessary interfaces for external/internal implementations.
[SPS]: Move SPS classes to a separate package
Fine-grained locking while consuming journal stream.
